title: PULSAR: Lost Colony - Pre Beta 3
description:
PULSAR: Lost Colony is an online cooperative starship simulator that takes you and your crew to the farthest corners of the universe on a mission to find the mysterious Lost Colony. It features a procedural galaxy generator so every journey will be unique and contain new challenges for you and your crew.

Features

    Online + LAN CO-OP (up to five players)
    Cross-platform multiplayer
    Crew PERMADEATH
    Random planets and galaxy each time you start a voyage
    AI with an advanced Neural Network (learns as you play)
    Multiple upgrade paths per class
    Challenge modes such as the Captain's Challenge
    Online leaderboards / voyage tracking
    Full support for the Oculus Rift and Gamepads
